survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with the current corporate wellness programs offered by the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness programs currently offered by the company?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness programs currently offered by the company?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture full participation data.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes). Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How has participating in wellness programs impacted your overall well-being?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is not empty.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure perceived impact.

script.question_text: How has participating in wellness programs impacted your overall well-being?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q2 is not empty.

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered by the company?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather suggestions for future programs. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered by the company?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's wellness programs to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
